title: Set Difficulty Level of Questions
expected_result: Difficulty level is set to moderate

title: AI Suggests Standard and Role-Based Questions
expected_result: Standard and role-based questions are displayed

title: Create Interview
expected_result: Interview is created and unique public interview link is displayed

title: View candidate responses
steps: Verify that structured answers, video recordings, scores, and resumes are displayed for each candidate
expected_result: All candidate responses are displayed with structured answers, video recordings, scores, and resumes

title: View interview scores and communication scores
steps: Select a candidate who has completed a video interview
Verify that the interview score and communication score are displayed
expected_result: The interview score and communication score are displayed for the selected candidate

title: View AI analysis summary
steps: Select a candidate who has completed a video interview
Verify that the AI analysis summary is displayed, including observations, positives, and negatives
expected_result: The AI analysis summary is displayed for the selected candidate, including observations, positives, and negatives

title: Reject or select candidate
steps: Select a candidate who has completed a video interview
Verify that an action button is displayed to either select or reject the candidate
expected_result: The action button to select or reject the candidate is displayed

title: Upload resumes for screening
steps: Verify that the AI commences the screening process
expected_result: The AI begins screening the uploaded resumes

title: View resume scores and recommendations
steps: Verify that the resume scores and AI recommendations are displayed
expected_result: The resume scores and AI recommendations are displayed for each uploaded resume

title: Send interview link to candidate
steps: Select a candidate who has been recommended by the AI
Verify that an interview link can be sent to the candidate, valid for 24 hours
expected_result: The interview link can be sent to the candidate and is valid for 24 hours

title: View interview summary
steps: Send an interview link to a candidate
Wait for the candidate to submit their interview
Verify that the interview summary is displayed, including AI analysis
expected_result: The interview summary is displayed, including AI analysis, after the candidate submits their interview
